name: CINNOX
description: CINNOX is a comprehensive SaaS platform that unifies traditional and digital touchpoints. Businesses can connect, orchestrate, and evaluate all of their customer and team interactions to deliver a frictionless omnichannel experience that elevates business performance and optimises productivity. There’s no turning back. The great digital transformation has reshaped the customer service businesses forever, with heightened demand for quality engagement through new modes of communication.
features: Turn website traffic into sales conversions and build loyalty.
Filter out spam enquiries, automatically answer common questions, segment and qualify leads to free up your team to focus on value-adding tasks and conversions.
Route enquiries to the right agents based on automated routing rules, flexibly handling high traffic with ease.
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
tags: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Humanising Connections for Better Business
ShortDescription: CINNOX is a Total Experience SaaS platform that elevates customer and staff experiences with innovative omnichannel engagement and analytics solution.
enhanced_description: CINNOX is a comprehensive Total Experience (TX) SaaS platform that unifies traditional and digital touchpoints to humanize connections for better business outcomes. It enables organizations to connect, orchestrate, and evaluate all customer and team interactions, delivering a frictionless omnichannel experience that elevates both customer and staff experiences. This platform is designed to optimize business performance and productivity, directly addressing the heightened demand for quality engagement through new modes of communication in the digital transformation era.
key_use_cases: Omnichannel customer and team interaction management
Lead generation and qualification from website traffic
competitive_advantages: Unified omnichannel platform for traditional and digital touchpoints
Comprehensive orchestration and evaluation of all customer and team interactions
Automated lead qualification, segmentation, and spam filtering
Automated and flexible enquiry routing for high traffic volumes
Focus on elevating both customer and staff experiences
roi_benefits: Increased sales conversions from website traffic
Reduced time spent on spam enquiries
Efficient handling of common questions through automation
Increased team focus on value-adding tasks
Better handling of high traffic volumes for enquiries
Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Boosted hiring manager confidence and productivity
scalability_features: Ability to handle high traffic volumes flexibly
